All Classes

Class
Description
Allergy
This class is used to model an allergy stored in the database.
AllergyWindow
This application window is used to add new allergies to a patient
Appointment
This class is used to model an appointment stored in the database.
Assign
To assign the patient with the doctors.
Client
This object is used to pass our TCP connection from jframe to jframe (screen to screen).
Clinic
This class is used to model a clinic stored in the database.
ClinicalLogin
In-page for the Medical Records Management Viewpoint.
Clock
This tool is used to model clock/calendar usage.
Comment
This class is used to model a comment stored in the database.
CommentList
This application window is used to provide a comment view for a doctor.
Condition
This class is used to model a condition stored in the database.
Configuration
This class is used to model the TCP connection info used for client and server communication.
Counter
This tool is used to pass the counter of conditions and/or treatment.
Create_Appointment
Interface for Receptionists.
CreatePatient
This application windows is used to create a new patient for our system.
CreatePDF
This tool is used to create a PDF report for the health service management viewpoint.
CustomColours
This UI help class is used for us to have access to the Apple defined colors for software development.
Diagnosis
This application window is used in order to provide doctors a form to add a diagnosis for a patient.
Doctor
This class is used to model a doctor stored in the database.
Drug
This class is used to model a drug stored in the Database.
EmailService
This tool is used to send an email to someone.
FileResourcesUtils
This class supports IO fetch and usage.
HandleRequests
The class that handles each request differently according to the type.
HealthServ
This class is used to model a Health Service person.
HealthService
Main Interface for Health Service Staff.
HealthServiceLogin
In-page for the Health Service Viewpoint.
JDBC
This object is the middleware between the server and the SQL Database.
MainPage
This application window is used to provide the doctors a main page to select their actions
MedicalRecordsLogin
In-page for the Medical Records Management Viewpoint.
Patient
This class is used to model a patient stored in the database.
PatientRecord
This class is used to model a patient record stored in the database.
PatientView
This application window presents the patient info to a doctor.
Query
This object is used to exchange messages between client and server.
Receptionist
Main Interface for Health Service Staff.
ReceptionistLogin
Main Interface for Health Service Staff.
ReceptionistObj
This class is used to model a Health Service person.
RecordReport
This class is used to export record data for a patient.
RecordsStaff
This class is used to model a Medical Records Staff person.
ReportData
This tool is used to create a PDF report for a clinic.
Request
This class represents a request object.
Requests
This class represents the Requests.
RequestType
There are 4 types of request types used in the Request.java and HandleRequests.java.
Server
This is the server class.
Transaction
This is the class used for the transaction requirement.
Transactions
This class represents
Treatment
This class is used to model a treatment stored in the database.
Viewpoint
This enum (Type) is used in the Query object to determine which viewpoint communicates with the server.
WelcomeRecordStaff
This application windows is used (as of now) just for displaying some info about the record management staff.
